title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 292 - Combined Returns And Statements And Single Payment Of Total Amount Of Taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 292 - Combined Returns And Statements And Single Payment Of Total Amount Of Taxes

State Regulations
§ 292.1 - Combined returns and employer's returns
§ 292.2 - Payment of a single amount to the State Tax Commission

Subpart 292-1 - Repealed

Subpart 292-2 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 292

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697, 1312; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §
11-1797

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
